entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Quaqtaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:07 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -33.8°C

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 55 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 30.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 30. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
